name: ICICI CC [CPL] IN
name_aliases: icicicc, icici credit, icicii cc, icici cc cpl
description:
Company Description: ICICI Bank Limited is an Indian multinational banking and financial services company headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra. ICICI Bank is India's largest private sector bank which offers a wide range of banking products and financial services to corporate and retail customers through a variety of delivery channels and through its specialized subsidiaries in the areas of investment banking, life and non-life insurance, venture capital, and asset management.

Campaign Description: It is a CPL (cost per lead) campaign wherein we must bring quality leads for ICICI credit card. Advertisers offering their affiliates to run it pan india with mentioned targeted audiences. All allowed promotional methods are selected under traffic sources. 
Target Geo - Pan India

Target Audience 

 - Salaried, Income >25k / m, Salary in Account Transfer, 23-54 years

- Self Employed, Income +30k/m

Objective: To deliver approved leads for ICICI Credit Card

name: IndusInd Tiger Credit Card [CPA] IN
description:
Company Description: IndusInd Bank Limited is a new-generation Indian bank headquartered in Pune. The bank offers commercial, transactional, and electronic banking products and services. IndusInd Bank was inaugurated in April 1994 by then Union Finance Minister Manmohan Singh.

Campaign Description: This is a CPA campaign where the publishers need to drive card dispatch to aim for IndusInd Bank Credit Card.

Campaign Objective: Card dispatch to the user.

Eligibility Criteria

·       Age: 21 to 65 years

·       Employment: Both salaried and self-employed individuals

·       Salaried Income: Rs 35,000 per month

·       Self Employed: Rs 4,20,000 per annum

·       Credit Score: 700+

·       New to Credit: Not Allowed

Documents Needed

·       ID Proof: PAN Card/Form 60

·       Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, or utility bills

·       Income Proof: Bank statements or Salary slips

·       Photograph: Recent passport-sized photo

Payout Eligibility -

1. A minimum transaction of Rs.100 within 30 days is mandatory to activate your card; otherwise, you wont be eligible for the commission
2. Customers to use Aadhaar linked mobile number to fill the application
3. VKYC done over 50km from your Aadhaar/communication address will result in application rejection and loss of Rewards

name: SBI CC [CPA] IN
description:
Company Description : SBI Card was launched in October 1998 by the State Bank of India and GE Capital. Incorporated as SBI Cards and Payment Services Limited (previously known as SBI Cards and Payment Services Private Limited), SBI Card is headquartered in Gurgaon, Haryana. In December 2017, State Bank of India and The Carlyle Group acquired GE Capital`s stake in the Company. SBI holds 74% while Carlyle holds 26% in the SBI Card. The aim of SBI Card is to offer Indian consumers access to a wide range of world-class, value-added payment products and services. Our endeavor is to simplify the lives of our customers, employees, and other important stakeholders. Our innovative products and services along with our responsible corporate citizenship practices form the framework of delivering on this promise. We were awarded “Mar Tech Leadership Award” for the year 2021-22 under the category “Use of Technologies - Best Data Enablement Campaign” at MarTech Leadership Summit 2022. Within a short span of 10 months, we achieved a credit card customer base of 1 lakh. We entered the '1 Million Card Club’ in 2002 and crossed the 2 million card base in 2005. We are one of the leading players in the Indian credit card market, with over 15 million+ cards in force as of November’22, and have a presence across India.

Campaign Description: SBI credit card Campaign needs to be promoted on CPA (cost per card disbursal) model where the validation will be done for card disbursals only.

Targeting audience : Male and Female 

Objective : To deliver card disbursals

name: Axis bank CC [CPA] IN
description:
Company Description: Axis Bank Limited, formerly known as UTI Bank (1993–2007), is an Indian banking and financial services company headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It is India's third largest private sector bank by assets and Fourth largest by Market capitalisation. It sells financial services to large and mid-size companies, SMEs and retail businesses.

As of 30 June 2016, 30.81% shares are owned by the promoters and the promoter group (United India Insurance Company Limited, Oriental Insurance Company Limited, National Insurance Company Limited, New India Assurance Company Ltd, GIC, LIC and UTI). The remaining 69.19% shares are owned by mutual funds, FIIs, banks, insurance companies, corporate bodies and individual investors

Campaign Description: The campaign needs to be promoted on the CPA (cost per card issuance) module. Partner would get a payout on Card issuance. 

Partners/DSA need to convince customer (Criteria: Net Salary min 15K & above, Self-employed Rs 4 lakh latest ITR) for credit card basis its benefits, value proposition & need to assist to complete IPA journey (digital lead generation process). IPA journey is very short & simple, The customer needs to fill in his personal & occupational details in journey , need to select credit card & then needs to submit a digital application. 

Based on IPA journey output either application would be approved or declined. For approved cases


	If only KYC needs to be collected then the Partner needs to guide the customer to complete the Video KYC process, the card would be booked in a short span under this process. 
	If Income + KYC needs to be collected from the customer then these leads would be taken care of by Axis Bank, Bank Centralized pickup team would fix an appointment with the customer & will complete the documentation process digitally


Card-wise Categorization:


	
		
			Card Type
			Category
		
		
			Vistara Infinite
			True Affluent
		
		
			Magnus Credit Card
			True Affluent
		
		
			Axis Bank Atlas Credit Card
			True Affluent
		
		
			My Zone Visa Card
			Retail

			Retail

			Retail

			Retail

			Retail

			Retail

			Retail

			Retail

			Emerging Affluent

			Emerging Affluent

name: Bajaj Finserv [EMI Card] IN
description:
Brand Description : Bajaj Finserv is a leading financial services company in India that offers a wide range of products and services to its customers.

It provides provide financial solutions for retail and SME customers through their life cycle – asset acquisition and lifestyle enhancement through financing, asset protection through insurance, family protection through life and health insurance, healthcare needs for the family, savings & investment products, wealth management, retirement planning and annuities. 

Campaign Description : Cost Per KYC Verified

Targeting Geo : Pan India

It is an offline campaign.

name: Tata Neu Credit Card [CPD] IN
description:
Brief profile of your company: industry, products/services

Negative keywords: specify all words and phrases (e.g., brand name) that you don’t want publishers to use in contextual ads

Benefits for customers: 24/7 or free delivery, wide variety of exclusive brands, positive reviews on third-party websites, high customer satisfaction rate, etc.

Target audience portrait: gender, age, income, occupation, marital status, etc.

Popular products: specify your bestsellers

Brand positioning tips: tell publishers what they should emphasize; specify words or phrases they should use in ads, etc.

 

Campaign mode - Offline

name: Jupiter Money [ Android , CPA ] IN
description:
Brief Description
Jupiter is a digital-first banking platform built to deliver a modern, intuitive banking experience tailored especially for young professionals and digitally savvy users. It combines financial tools, simple design, and convenience to help users manage their money smarter and with minimal friction.

Campaign Description
The campaign focuses on driving high-quality app installs and active user engagement by highlighting Jupiter’s effortless money management features.

Target Geo
More than 3000 pincodes covered pan-India, with complete pincode details available in the campaign brief.
